Tyrael looked at the ship. Still a few cycles left before it blew up. 
He sent a comm signal to the CR bays and about two dozens stasis pods 
flew out of it. He would at least save them.

He turned and looked at the battlefield. Things were chaotic at the 
very least.

Meteara came down in front of the so-called Reaper. She seemed not 
impressed one bit.

Meteara: What is the matter, Cybertronian? You come for me, yet I have 
never seen you. Do you really want to fight? Even after seeing that I 
just destroyed this ship?

Sanguine said nothing. She came closer and just punched Meteara in the 
face. She was thrown back a few feet away.

Sanguine: Shut up and fight, Junk!

She produced a heavy proton cannon and fired twice.

The Vok was caught unaware by the first shot but raised her pincer and 
countered with her machine gun.

Sanguine was hit but she did not mind. She would kill the lady.
